title: SCADA Market – Global Industry Analysis Report Unveiled by Technavio
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 8:45 AM   TechNavio Research 
LONDON -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Technavio has published a new report on the global supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA) market ,which is expected to grow at a CAGR of more than 6% from 2015-2019. 
SCADA market segmentation including type, end-user, and geography 
Technavio’s report analyses the solutions and products offered by market vendors and presents a comprehensive breakdown in terms of market segmentation for different types, including solutions and services. 
Additionally, analysts have segmented market projections by key geography, and also by end-user, focusing on oil and gas industry, power industry, manufacturing industry, water and wastewater industry, chemical and petrochemical industry, pharmaceuticals, and others. 
“Big data analytics was initially limited to the IT industry, but now it has started gaining popularity in the oil and gas, chemicals, and power sectors. Moreover, the combination of SCADA and big data analytics is a growing trend in these sectors to facilitate decision-making, reduce errors, and analyse the root causes of operational issues. This trend is expected to propel the growth of SCADA systems to industries that deal with large volumes of real-time data,” says Faisal Ghaus, Vice President of Technavio. 
SCADA: Market scope and calculation of market size 
This report covers the present scenario and growth prospects for the global SCADA market from 2015-2019. To calculate the market size, we consider the revenue generated from sales of SCADA solutions and services.
